mapper.insert: insert into members (id, name, agenda, tele_number, card_type, status, balance, credit, start_date, end_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agenda,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{credit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update members
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agenda = #{agenda,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tele_number = #{teleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

credit = #{credit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
